mapper.select: select id,name,mobile,age,visit_time as visitTime,profession, create_time as createTime,update_time as updateTime,state from t_visit where 1=1 and mobile = #{mobile} order by create_time desc limit #{pageSize},#{limit}
select count(id) from t_visit where 1=1 and mobile = #{mobile}
select count(id) from t_visit where 1=1 and visit_time = #{time}
select id,name,mobile,age,visit_time as visitTime,profession, create_time as createTime,update_time as updateTime,state from t_visit where mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_visit SET name = #{name} ,mobile = #{mobile} ,age = #{age} ,profession=#{profession} ,visit_time = #{visitTime} ,modify_time = now() ,state=#{state} WHERE id = #{id}
